tool_description: Modifies existing bounding box annotations by updating coordinates, class labels, flags, and metadata while preserving annotation history.

annotation_id.description: Unique identifier of the annotation to modify

new_bbox_coordinates.description: Updated bounding box coordinates as [x_min, y_min, x_max, y_max]

new_confidence_score.description: Updated confidence score (0.0 to 1.0, -1 means no change)

editor_id.description: Identifier of the person editing the annotation

edit_notes.description: Reason or notes for this edit

error_messages: Annotation not found: The specified annotation_id does not exist. Verify the annotation ID is correct.
Invalid bbox_coordinates: If provided, must contain exactly 4 numbers [x_min, y_min, x_max, y_max] with x_min < x_max and y_min < y_max.
Coordinates out of bounds: Updated bounding box coordinates must be within image dimensions. Check values against image size.
Invalid class_name: If provided, class name must exist in project class configuration. Verify class is defined.
Invalid confidence_score: If provided (not -1), score must be between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive. Adjust the value.
Missing editor_id: Editor identifier is required for change tracking. Provide a valid editor_id.
No changes specified: At least one field must be updated. Provide new_bbox_coordinates, new_class_name, or new_confidence_score.
usage: Provide annotation_id and editor_id, then specify which fields to update using new_bbox_coordinates, new_class_name, or new_confidence_score. Add edit_notes to document changes. Returns updated annotation details.

changes_made.description: List of fields that were modified

previous_version_id.description: Identifier of the annotation version before this edit
